Question: TSGC Technologies Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
TSGC Technologies Inc.

Product: PV Circulator - Comprehensive PV Panel Recycling Solution

- Uses mechanical technology to disassemble end-of-life solar panels without chemicals or heat
- Integrated with Vision AI and autonomous Machine Learning for continuous process optimization
- IoT device generating immutable recycling records, ensuring transparency and serving as proof of ESG
- Revolutionizes solar panel recycling with efficiency, smart, and eco-friendly approach
- CES 2024 Innovation Award winner and Intersolar Award 2023 finalist
